Record Label: Big Ship Records

By far the best album I've heard this year.

Thoughts about If You Leave, an album by Daughter.

Release Date: March, 2013

Record Label: 4AD

With their debut album If You Leave, indie trio Daughter come as close to a perfect record as I’ve heard in a long time.

This is a year for ‘quiet music’ to become the mouse that roared

Thoughts about Oh So Quiet EP, an EP by Oh So Quiet.

Release Date: April, 2013

Record Label: Cool For Cats

Oh So Quiet have more bombast than their name suggests, but still confirm 2013 as a vintage year for subtle, thoughtful music.

Record Label: Red Deer Club
